snippet: A federal judge sentenced an Idaho man on Monday to 25 years in prison for firing a semiautomatic rifle at the White House in November 2011.
abstract: Federal judge sentences Idaho man Oscar Ramiro Ortega-Hernandez to 25 years in prison for firing a semiautomatic rifle at the White House in November 2011; Ortega-Hernandez pleaded guilty to firearms and property damage charges related to terrorism.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge sentenced an Idaho man on Monday to 25 years in prison for firing a semiautomatic rifle at the White House in November 2011.

headline.main: Man Who Shot at White House Gets 25 Years
headline.print_headline: Man Who Shot at White House Gets 25 Years
